name: TheChargerBulletin
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The Charger Bulletin is the official app for the student newspaper of the University of New Haven. It is a location-based mobile app platform that delivers to students late-breaking campus news and local information about our community. The app is free and requires no registration to use.
